DELETE /accounts/{identifier}/access/ide.description: Deletes an identity provider from Access.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

200.description: Delete an Access identity provider response

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

scim_config.description: The configuration settings for enabling a System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM) with the identity provider.

enabled.description: A flag to enable or disable SCIM for the identity provider.

group_member_deprovision.description: A flag to revoke a user's session in Access and force a reauthentication on the user's Gateway session when they have been added or removed from a group in the Identity Provider.

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

support_groups.description: Should Cloudflare try to load groups from your account

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

scim_config.description: The configuration settings for enabling a System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM) with the identity provider.

enabled.description: A flag to enable or disable SCIM for the identity provider.

group_member_deprovision.description: A flag to revoke a user's session in Access and force a reauthentication on the user's Gateway session when they have been added or removed from a group in the Identity Provider.

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

scim_config.description: The configuration settings for enabling a System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM) with the identity provider.

enabled.description: A flag to enable or disable SCIM for the identity provider.

group_member_deprovision.description: A flag to revoke a user's session in Access and force a reauthentication on the user's Gateway session when they have been added or removed from a group in the Identity Provider.

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.

type.description: The type of identity provider. To determine the value for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

attributes.description: A list of SAML attribute names that will be added to your signed JWT token and can be used in SAML policy rules.

email_attribute_name.description: The attribute name for email in the SAML response.

header_attributes.description: Add a list of attribute names that will be returned in the response header from the Access callback.

header_name.description: header that will be added on the request to the origin

idp_public_certs.description: X509 certificate to verify the signature in the SAML authentication response

issuer_url.description: IdP Entity ID or Issuer URL

sign_request.description: Sign the SAML authentication request with Access credentials. To verify the signature, use the public key from the Access certs endpoints.

sso_target_url.description: URL to send the SAML authentication requests to

config.description: The configuration parameters for the identity provider. To view the required parameters for a specific provider, refer to our [developer documentation](https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-one/identity/idp-integration/).

name.description: The name of the identity provider, shown to users on the login page.

scim_config.description: The configuration settings for enabling a System for Cross-Domain Identity Management (SCIM) with the identity provider.

enabled.description: A flag to enable or disable SCIM for the identity provider.

group_member_deprovision.description: A flag to revoke a user's session in Access and force a reauthentication on the user's Gateway session when they have been added or removed from a group in the Identity Provider.

seat_deprovision.description: A flag to remove a user's seat in Zero Trust when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.  This cannot be enabled unless user_deprovision is also enabled.

secret.description: A read-only token generated when the SCIM integration is enabled for the first time.  It is redacted on subsequent requests.  If you lose this you will need to refresh it token at /access/identity_providers/:idpID/refresh_scim_secret.

user_deprovision.description: A flag to enable revoking a user's session in Access and Gateway when they have been deprovisioned in the Identity Provider.
